EmailTemplate.name: LE-03-14-202203-HHS-ENT-SEVT-HIMSS22.Pre Event Invite 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Hear one of our client stories at HIMSS
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
JOIN US Lessons Learned from Launching a Virtual Nursing Unit March 15 │ 4:15 PM Eastern HIMSS22 Orlando, FL
The nursing shortage has reached critical levels—more than 1.1 million new RNs are needed by hospitals and health systems to provide care. 1 Saint Luke’s Health System is leveraging virtual care to serve their inpatient population and help alleviate their nurse staffing challenges. Learn more <[[https://www.himss.org/global-conference/session-lessons-learned-launching-virtual-nursing-unit]]> Lessons Learned from Launching a Virtual Nursing Unit Read this <[[https://www.healthcareitnews.com/news/what-you-need-know-about-standing-virtual-nursing-unit]]> Healthcare IT News article for a preview of the session. Virtual nursing helped Saint Luke’s Health System: Enhance bedside care response rates Increase patient and nurse satisfaction Reduce the burden on bedside nurses Positively impact quality and patient safety Speakers Dr. Shayan Vyas Senior Vice President & Medical Director Teladoc Health Jennifer Ball Director of Virtual Care Saint Luke’s Health System To learn more about our suite of services, we invite you to schedule a meeting <[[https://calendly.com/teladochealth-marketingevents/himss-2022-strategy-session-with-teladoc-health?month=2022-01]]> or stop by booth 4449 <[[https://himss22.mapyourshow.com/8_0/floorplan/?hallID=W&selectedBooth=booth~4449]]> to hear more about our enterprise virtual care offering. 1U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics Unsubscribe <[[https://go1.teladochealth.com/subscriptions.html]]> | Privacy <[[https://teladochealth.com/privacy-policy/]]> | Legal Notice <[[https://teladochealth.com/notice-of-non-discrimination/]]> ©Teladoc Health, Inc. All rights reserved. 2 Manhattanville Rd., Purchase, NY 10577
